name: Green Swirl - Clay Beaded Necklace
description:
\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

Hand shaped and finished clay beaded necklace in black, white, granite grey, forest green, and copper.
1 black and copper bead and 1 copper bead sit beside a focal swirled bead of black, white, granite grey and forest green.
Strung along a dark brown leather cord, knotted at the ends. Light tan or deep forest green leather cord also available. Please include a preference at time of purchase if you wish.
Neck opening is approx. 15".
Slips over the head.

Be aware that as each set of beads are handmade there will be some variation in the shape and size.

Please note that this item is made to order. I will mail this out within 1-2 weeks of order as the item is made on demand.

\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

\\\upgrades/insurance

If you would like additional shipping coverage, a quicker shipping speed or more information, please let me know and I will figure out how best to suit your needs. I'm happy to create custom listings.

\\\packaging

No need to worry about receiving a battered and worn piece of work you've just bought - hearty packing coming your way:
.Photographs will be protected with an acid free plastic envelope and then shipped in a sturdy mailer or other sturdy cardboard.
.Jewelry is wrapped in tissue paper, tucked in a little muslin bag and then shipped in a sturdy mailer.

\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

© Sarah J Croft | 2012

name: Big Red - Clay Beaded Necklace
description:
\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

Hand shaped and finished clay beaded necklace in white, bright red and copper.
Strung along a leather cord, knotted at the ends.
Cord color choices include light tan, deep forest green, eggplant purple, and black.
Neck opening is approx. 16". Adjustable.
Slips over the head.

Be aware that as each set of beads are handmade there will be some variation in the shape and size.

description:
\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

Stacked black and white rectangular beads accented with royal blue and bronze spacers.
Strung along a cream cord and knotted at the end.

name: Oxblood Medallion - Handmade Clay Necklace
description:
\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

Hand shaped and finished clay medallion in dark red, granite grey and stone white.
Dark red has a marbled texture with maroon and bright red clay blended together. White has a soft pinkish hue with white flecks blended in and grey has a granite appearance.
Strung along a dark brown leather cord, knotted at the ends. Light tan or green leather cord also available. Please include a preference at time of purchase if you wish.
Neck opening is approx. 15".
Slips over the head.

Be aware that as each medallion is handmade there will be some variation in the shape.

Please note that this item is made to order. I will mail this out within 1-2 weeks of order as the item is made on demand.

\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

name: Navy Medallion - Handmade Clay Necklace
description:
\\\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------///

Hand shaped and finished clay medallion in dark blue and white.
Dark blue has a stone-like texture with transparent clay blended in while white is flat.
Strung along a light tan leather cord, knotted at the ends. Dark brown or green leather cord also available. Please include a preference at time of purchase if you wish.
Neck opening is approx. 15".
Slips over the head.

Be aware that as each medallion is handmade there will be some variation in the shape.

Please note that this item is made to order. I will mail this out within 1-2 weeks of order as the item is made on demand.
